plot: Two close friends are separated for fifty years by wartime tragedy, only for one to suspect the other to be the mole who betrayed their squadron to the Nazis.
title: The Gift
plot_es: Two close friends are separated for fifty years by wartime tragedy, only for one to suspect the other to be the mole who betrayed their squadron to the Nazis.
plot_en: Two close friends are separated for fifty years by wartime tragedy, only for one to suspect the other to be the mole who betrayed their squadron to the Nazis.
